source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_SEQ_00<tab>M'septha has the look of a woman with questions that beg for answers.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_SEQ_00<tab>ピーリングストーンズのメ・セプサは、アナンタ族について調べているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Ananta at Vira Nilya.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_TODO_00<tab>ウィルラ・ニリヤのアナンタ族と話す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_TODO_02<tab>Obtain resin from the designated location.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the resin-filled jar to M'septha.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_001<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Can you spare a moment?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_001<tab>ねえ、あなた。
時間があるなら、私の頼みを聞いてくれないかしら？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_002<tab>We'll be meeting to barter with the Ananta soon, and I'd like to surprise them with something more than our usual wares. Something special.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_002<tab>今度のアナンタ族との物々交換会で、定番の品と一緒に、
彼女たちが喜ぶ品を用意したいの。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_003<tab>I'd like to find out what sorts of things they actually need, but they're like to discover my plans if I were to ask them directly. That's where you come in. I need you to go and speak with them for me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_003<tab>そこで、「ウィルラ・ニリヤ」にいるアナンタ族から、
彼女たちの願望や、困っていることについて、調査してほしいの。
そうね……5人ぐらいから聞き取りを行ってくれる？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_004<tab>No need to question <var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var> in the village, of course. If you strike up conversation with even five of the Ananta I'm sure you'll learn plenty. Then I can see to preparing goods they'll truly enjoy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_004<tab>彼女たちの事情を知ることができれば、
交換会でどんな品物を用意すればいいか、わかるからね。
それじゃ、お願いね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_010<tab>Speaking with everyone at Vira Nilya would be overly ambitious. Five of the Ananta should be more than enough to figure out what they're looking for.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_010<tab>「ウィルラ・ニリヤ」にいるアナンタ族から、
彼女たちの願望や、困っていることについて、調査してほしいの。
そうね……5人ぐらいから聞き取りを行ってくれる？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_JAYANTI_000_020<tab>Sssorry, but I have no time to talk. I must see to my sssisters' fencing lessons.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_JAYANTI_000_020<tab>シュー……ほう、何か不足している物はないか、と？
実は、狩猟に使う矢の数が心許なくなってきてな、
そろそろ補充したいと思っていたところだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_NANDINA_000_030<tab>Hm? We were dissscussing what to do about our upcoming meeting with the M tribe. I made a grievous error taking ssstock of our arrows. I fear we will come up short if sssomething is not done soon.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_NANDINA_000_030<tab>シュー……不足している物？
現在、メ族との交換会に向けて、装飾品を用意しているのだが、
素材の見積もりを誤ってな……追加してもらえるとありがたい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MANIK_000_040<tab>I would give anything for a new pair of gloves. My ssskin is quite delicate, you see, and these gloves tend to chafe my arms. Sssadly the thread I need is not easy to come by.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MANIK_000_040<tab>シュー……何か欲しい物はないか、と？
我が麗しき肌を守るため、長手袋を新調したいのだが、
素材となる糸が、貴重なため手に入らないのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_GARIMA_000_050<tab>Is my trouble written ssso plainly on my face? If you mussst know, I worry the poison we lace our arrows with is too potent.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_GARIMA_000_050<tab>シュー……困っていることと言ってよいのかわからぬが、
矢に塗布する毒の効能が、幾分強すぎるように思う。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_GARIMA_100_050<tab>One ssslip of the hand and we would be irreparably ssscarred, forever depriving the world of our unequaled beauty. Jussst the thought of it is too much to bear.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_GARIMA_100_050<tab>我らアナンタの美しい身体が、炎症を起こして爛れてしまったら、
それは、大地が慟哭するほどの損失であろう？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_PRAPTI_000_060<tab>Why do I ssseem so bothered? My sssisters are constantly fawning over me. “How are your ssscales so lussstrous and sssmooth?” “You mussst tell us where you get your rouge.” “I wish I had your hourglasss figure.” <sigh> It'sss not easy being beautiful.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_PRAPTI_000_060<tab>シュー……我に悩んでいることなどない。
強いて言えば、すべてが美しすぎること、だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_070<tab>Welcome back. I trust your talks with the Ananta were enlightening?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_070<tab>おかえりなさい。
アナンタ族が何を欲しがっているか、わかった？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_071<tab>I see. I didn't realize their stocks of supplies were so lacking. Anything else?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_071<tab>……ふむふむ、なるほど。
欲しいものはたくさんあるみたいね。
次に、困っていることは？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_100_072<tab>The poison for their arrows is <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> potent? I imagine such a potential irritant to the skin would prove troublesome when preparing their arrows. Especially given their aversion to anything that might blemish their skin.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_100_072<tab>毒矢に使う毒の成分が強すぎるって？
なるほど……肌に触れたときのことを恐れているのね。
美意識の高い彼女たちらしいわね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_072<tab>I've got it! I will make them long gloves to protect against their poisons. They'll need a special coating, and I'll need your help to get it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_072<tab>そうだ、いいことを思いついちゃった。
毒液さえも弾く樹脂を塗った繊維を使って、
長手袋を作れば、彼女たちの需要を一気に解決できるじゃない！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_073<tab>Take this container to East End and fill it with resin from the trees there. I will see to readying fabric for the gloves.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_073<tab>そうと決まれば、あなたはイーストエンド混交林に行って、
樹脂を<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D2601 /var>いっぱいに集めてきてちょうだい！
私は、急いで糸を紡いで用意しておくわ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_074<tab>The resin from the trees of East End is quite resilient. The Ananta will have nothing to fear with gloves using that as a protective coating.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_074<tab>イーストエンド混交林に行って、
樹脂を<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D2601 /var>いっぱいに集めてきてちょうだい！
私は、急いで糸を紡いで用意しておくわ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>You tap the tree, but it fails to yield any resin.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>この木から採取できそうな樹脂はないようだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_090<tab>How did you fare at East End?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_090<tab>お帰りなさい！
樹脂は採れたかしら？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_091<tab>Good, good. This is more than enough. The Ananta will be quite pleased.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_091<tab>ありがとう！
これだけあれば、十分よ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_092<tab>You may be surprised to know that we've had altercations with the Ananta a time or two over territory disputes. Thankfully we've managed to settle things, and this bartering of goods helps maintain good relations. Thanks to you, we can keep doing just that.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_092<tab>アナンタ族とは、猟場を巡って対立することもあるけど、
彼女たちの作る装飾品は、メ族も一目置いているのよ。
今後も、いい関係を保ち続けないとね。
